Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $179.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:54:39 UTC – Details)

From the brand

AOOG has always insisted on providing cost-effective car seat covers. Not only does it provide superior protection and meets versatile needs, it also adds comfort to your drive.Amazing details, clever design. Each AOOG seat cover has its own set of interior styles, details and premium materials. Discover the saddle that fits your vehicle.

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

F150 Leather Seat Covers

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: High-Grade Leatherette materials Protect the original car seat from damage, Durable Wear-Resistant Waterproof Easy to Clean. Equipped with thick, premium High-Density Foam to create top resilience for maximum comfort during your drive.
PROTECTS & LUXURIOUS: These are the perfect seat covers for your car. Our seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle. High-quality artificial leather and excellent appearance design, also refreshing the look of your interior.
STYLE DESIGN: Our universal fit seat covers with a unique visual design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags. The anchor attached to the elastic strap can also provide firm reinforcement.
EASY TO INSTALL: For your convenience, installation instructions are included in the product package, and we also provide product installation videos. Just follow the installation instructions, it usually takes 10-20 minutes to complete the installation.
UNIVERSAL FIT: Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles, including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. If you are not sure whether the vehicle is suitable for you, please contact us in time. Our customer service team will always online to assist you.

Read more

Details:
  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Lined with high-density foam for maximum comfort.
  • Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior.
  • Sideless design compatible with side armrests and airbags.
  • Easy to Install within minutes.

AOOG Leather Car Seat Covers Set – Waterproof Universal Car Seat Protector

AOOG Car Seat Covers can protect the original seat, give your car seat a new look.

These are the perfect seat covers, the best investment for your new vehicle, We design our products to ensure comfort is our top priority.

  • High-quality leatherette to provide valuable protection and luxurious comfort for almost any car or truck.
  • The entire seat, backrest and headrest are lined with high-density foam to provide maximum comfort during long-distance travel and daily commuting.
  • What’s In The Package?
  • 2 pcs Front Seat Covers + 2 pcs Front Headrest Covers.
  • Adjustable Back Seat Covers (for full set only).
  • A Hardware Bag of Steel Hooks and Round Plates for Install.
  • An Installation Manual.

Read more

Airbag Compatible

The airbag has enough room to stretch and will never be blocked. The front seat back has pockets for the things you want to put.

High-Quality Material

AOOG Seat Covers are made of multiple layers of high-quality materials to provide maximum comfort during your driving.

Breathable Holes

The main part of AOOG Seat Covers has Breathable Holes to ensure breathability during use and increase your comfortable experience

Five Colors

We provide a variety of colors for your choice

Read more

AOOG faux leather car seat cover are fit for most sedan, truck and suv

  • Fit Acura: Integra/Audi: A3 A4 A5 A6, A7, A8, Q5, Q7
  • Fit BMW: Series 1, Series 2, Series 3, Series 4, Series 5, Series 6, Series 7, Series 8, Mini Cooper, X1, X3, X4, X5, X6/Buick: Electra, Regal, Encore, LaCrosse, Enclave, Envision
  • Fit Chevrolet: SSR/Chevrolet: SSR, Cavalier, Malibu, Equinox, Traverse, Caprice, Impala/Cadillac: CTS, SRX/Chrysler : 300, Town & Country
  • Fit Dodge: Charger, Durango, Journey/Ford: Fiesta, Focus, Escape, Fusion, Mustang, Edge, Explorer
  • Fit Honda: City, Civic, CR-V, Pilot/Hummer：H2, H3/Hyundai: Elantra
  • Fit Jeep: Cherokee, Compass, Grand Cherokee, Grand Wagoneer/Kia: Sportage
  • Fit Land Rover: Range Rover Evoque, Range Rover/Lincoln: MKC, MKX, Continental, Navigator
  • Fit Mazda: 3/Mercedes-Benz: A Class, B Class, C Class, G Class, GLC, GLE, E Class, S Class
  • Fit Nissan: Sentra, X-Trail, Altima, Maxima, Frontier, Pathfinder
  • Fit Porsche: Macan/Toyota: Corolla, RAV4, Camry, Highlander, 4Runner, Land Cruiser/Volkswagen: Golf, Tiguan, Passat, CC, Touareg

Read more

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

Price: $159.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:35:57 UTC – Details)

Product Description

【Seasons Apply】This car seat cover can be suitable for every season. The outside of the material is faux leather which can be used all year round. So there is no need to buy one in summer and buy another one in winter.
【Compatibility】 It is universal fit for most of cars, SUVs and trucks. Meanwhile it has a wonderful envelopment with the car seats which can maximize the protection to the seats. We leak out the air bags, so once an accident occurs, the air bags still work.
【Clean and Durability】 This car seat cover is quite easy to clean up when your kids or pets smudge it. It is waterproof so you can use the wet towel directly on it. And when it comes to the routine care, you can treat it the same way to your leather bag. The faux leather we used is not easy to be damaged or broken by your keys, pet’s paws or some other sharp metal. And it is also not easy to be burned up as we use a kind of material which contains fire retardant inside the seat cover.
【Installation】 The installation of this seat cover is not complex. You can install it by yourself through the installation video step by step and can also read the installation instruction inside the package. Don’t forget to communicate with us by emails if you are still frustrated with the installation and we will try our best to help you.
【Post-sale service】 It has 30 days return-protection guarantee and the delivery is through the FBA. We have a problem solving team stand by and if you have any questions you can find us by emails quickly and we will try our best to help you. So just have a try and we are sure you will be satisfied with our products.


Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 10:35:57 UTC – Details)

Price: $17.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:02:06 UTC – Details)

From the brand

LISEN electronic accessory stand helps us break the bad habit of looking down at the phone for a long time

Most comfortable height for the neck, shoulders and neck designed by German scientists according to ergonomics
Preserving a head-up or slightly upward gaze while using electronic devices can successfully avoid development of “text neck”
This new phone stand that is higher than the triangular phone base will be your most valuable product

LISEN New Stand Recommend

TALLER AND MORE PHOTOGENIC STAND, HELP TO CORRECT THE “TEXT NECK”: This cell phone stand holder is in accordance with ergonomic design. Providing you comfortable viewing angle which helps to fix your posture and reduce neck & back strain. The height can be easily adjusted between 7.1in-8.5in(1.4in adjustable range), the angle is adjustable between 5°~85°
USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: [No bent & tangling & tip over worries] when using while charging. Due to bent cable, the low phone dock maybe fall over. LISEN stylish adjustable phone holder for desk has a reserved charging hole design, supports cable management, [No bent & tangling & tip over worries]. This phone pad will not cover the subtitle when you watch the video
WEIGHTED ANTI-SLIP BASE: This cell phone stand for desk is equipped with a weighted base and an aluminum alloy rod. Therefore, this iPhone stand holder is stable enough to support all smartphones or small tablets, such as 2021 iPad Mini, iPhone 14 pro max 13 Pro/13 Mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/iPhone 11/11 Pro/Max/X/MAX/XR/8/8P, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, Note 10/9/8/Plus, S10/S9/S8, Kindel, Switch, iPad Mini,iPad Air, etc.We recommend the most stable compatible device size is 4-10 inchs
ANTI-SLIP DESIGN: The pad back and the bottom of this cell phone stand are fully covered by anti-skid silicone, which LISEN iPad stand holder can provide maximum protection for your device from any scratches and slides, grips friendly
WE CARE ABOUT YOU: If the product arrives broken, or get broken within 365 days, please directly contact LISEN for satisfied solution. Any other problem like could not tighten the screw, please also contact us. We sincerely care about every customer’s shopping experience! (Product including: phone stand*1, screw*1, hexagon screwdriver*1, specification*1)






LISEN electronic Accessories stand help to save the bad habit that we are spending more and more time bow head to looking on our mobile phones

  • Choosing LISEN electronic accessories stand, the most suitable height designed by German scientists based on ergonomic shoulder and neck
  • As long as you insist on using it for 1 hour a day, Keep hold head looking up at electronic devices
  • Can effectively alleviate the formation of our “text neck”, help our family enjoy the joy of playing with electronic devices while staying healthy
  • This new style mobile electronic stand will be your most valuable product, higher than triangular cell phone dock, Save you from the bad habit of head down playing phone!

Questions & Answers

Q1: Is this cell phone stands stable for a big phone and tablets?

Answer: Yes. this phone holder can support all cell phones. In addition, LISEN iPhone stand for desk can also stably adapt to small tablets less than 10 inchs, like 2021 iPad mini etc.

Q2: How tall is this cell phone stand holder?

Answer: The height of this desk phone stand is 1.4 inches adjustable, is flush with the face or slightly higher, so that you can be more calm and elegant during video calls.




Thoughtful Storage Base

Aesthetics of desk fashion With a storage base design, this iPhone stand holder can help to organize small things, such as airphones, rings, clips to avoid losing them.

Cable Organizer & Charging Hole

Featured with reserved charging hole and cable organizer circle, this cell phone holder stand is convenient for charging, and make your desk neat and tidy. No worry with cable tangling.

Full Covered Silicone Pad

Fully covered by soft silicone pad (back and feet), it can protect devices from scratch while 4 to 10 inch devices sitting comfortably. And it can support up to 0.53 inch thick phones with case.

Read more

item.title: PetSafe Healthy Pet Food & Water Stations with Accessories – Dog & Cat Food & Water Dispensers – Stainless Steel Bowl Resists Corrosion & Stands Up to Frequent Use – Filters Maintain Freshness & Taste
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The PetSafe healthy pet water and food station is the ﬁrst gravity food system with a removable-stainless steel bowl that is easy to clean and is dishwasher safe. Simply sanitize the stainless steel bowl at high temperatures in your dishwasher to eliminate potential bacteria that can cause your pet harmful ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $27.99 - $19.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:27:35 UTC – Details)


The PetSafe healthy pet water and food station is the ﬁrst gravity food system with a removable-stainless steel bowl that is easy to clean and is dishwasher safe. Simply sanitize the stainless steel bowl at high temperatures in your dishwasher to eliminate potential bacteria that can cause your pet harmful infections from micro-organisms, allergic reactions or skin and nose irritations. The coordinating PetSafe healthy pet food station and healthy pet water station are designed to complement most home decor. Space-saving footprints and modern style are ideal for kitchens, laundry rooms, garages and other indoor areas. Sold separately is the healthy pet water filter to remove chlorine, sediments and odor from your pet’s drinking water. Water A: small- .5 gallon. The activated carbon filter removes bad tastes and odors from the water and catches large particles and debris from re-circulating back into the water. The filters do not purify the water. Change them every 2-4 weeks, depending on how many pets use the fountain, to keep the fountain water fresh and clean.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.8 x 6.5 x 10.5 inches; 1.1 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PFD17-11854
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 1, 2009
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Radio Systems Corporation
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B002RT8M84
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

DRINK ANY TIME: This gravity water station allows you to keep your pet hydrated at all times of the day or night
STURDY CONSTRUCTION: The reservoir is made of durable plastic and locks in place to help from knock over and spills
HYGIENIC WATER BOWL: The bowl is stainless steel and more hygienic for your pet
EASY-TO-CLEAN: Disassembles for easy cleaning; stainless steel bowl is dishwasher safe
U.S.-BASED CUSTOMER CARE: Our pet product experts are here to help you and your pet and are available by phone, email or chat if you have any questions
ESTABLISHED EXPERIENCE: PetSafe brand has been a trusted global leader in pet behavior, containment and lifestyle innovations for nearly 30 years. We help pets and their people LIVE HAPPY TOGETHER


Read more


Keep Your Pet Healthy and Hydrated

The PetSafe Healthy Pet Food and Water Stations are the first gravity food and water systems with a removable stainless steel bowl that is easy to clean and dishwasher safe. The food station works great for weekend trips as well as everyday use for the busy pet parent.

A Company You Can Trust

  • Global brand in pet products for nearly 30 years
  • U.S.-based experts available Monday through Saturday
  • We help pets and their people live happy together!

Read more

Healthy Pet Lifestyle




Matching Set

Pair your Water Station with a PetSafe Healthy Pet Food Station.

Multiple Sizes to Choose From

Choose the perfect size to match your pets needs. A constant supply of water means your pet can stay hydrated at all times of the day and night.

More Happy Moments

By keeping your pet hydrated, you and your pet can enjoy playtime more and live happy together.

Read more




Easy to Clean

Top rack dishwasher-safe stainless steel bowl

Safe Material

All parts are made with durable plastic and stainless steel

Filtered Water

Activated carbon filter keeps your pet’s water clean and fresh-tasting (filters not included).

Read more

Click to Purchase Click to Purchase Click to Purchase Click to Purchase Click to Purchase Click to Purchase
More PetSafe Solutions for You and Your Pet PetSafe Healthy Pet Carbon Filters help keep your pet’s water fresh. The PetSafe Drinkwell Pet Fountain Cleaning Kit makes it easy and convenient to clean your pet fountain. Feed your pet from anywhere with the PetSafe Smart Feed. Set your pet’s feeding schedule through the smartphone app-enabled feeder. The PetSafe ScoopFree Self-Cleaning Automatic Litter Box stays fresh and clean without the hassle of scooping. Let your furry friends come and go with the PetSafe Electronic SmartDoor. Easily program your pet’s entry and exit with the automatic setting. The Bolt is a fun interactive laser toy. The Bolt offers both an automatic mode which generates random patters and a manual mode where you control the action.

4.5

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return PolicyYou may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

HARDELL is a professional tools manufacturer. Whether you are a professional craftsman, a DIY enthusiast, or a modeling enthusiast in need of precision gadgets and miniature tools, HARDELL’s tools can help you.

Mini Cordless Rotary Tool

Rotary Tool Kits

Rotary Tool & Engraver

【Multipurpose Rotary Tool Set】The high-performance and low-noise rotary tool combined with 55 most popular power rotary tool accessories for DIY fine work, Not for Heavy-duty Projects. Whenever you think of carving, sanding, grinding, polishing or cutting, you’ll find this electric rotary unit is a must for creating your resin crafts. Owning one is like having a whole toolbox
【5-Speed Setting】The cordless rotary tool can realize 5-speed adjustment(5000/7000/9000/12000/15000 RPM),which makes it easier to adjust to a suitable speed to meet the power demand in different scenarios. It allows you to sand in stages safely and carefully. Even people without any experience can easily get started and control the speed easily. Micro rotary tool make your creation handy
【Compact Lightweight】Powerful but small and light, just like holding a pen while in use, for ultimate control and precision as well as for comfort
【Quick USB Charging, Longer Running Time】Rotary tool cordless comes with 3.7V rechargeable battery, can work continuously for 200 minutes. One charge can be used for multiple times, and the range is stress-free. Battery powered rotary tool make your work one after another. (The indicator light will turn green when it is fully charged)
【Rotary Drill with LED Indicator】The upgraded small cordless rotary tool has a blind spot lighting LED design. Reduce backlight shadows and overcome the adverse effects of dark areas on the use of the drill for resin, and provide you with a better experience


HARDELL MINI Rotary Tool is lightweight and small, you can carry it with you. It is suitable for different DIY working situation

  • Product Features：

  1. Cordless design: Cordless design of the rotary tool allows use anywhere without the need for an electrical outlet.
  2. USB Charging: Equipped with a USB power cord, making charging easier and more convenient.
  3. Spindle Lock: Onboard spindle lock makes for quick and easy bit changes.
  4. Variable Speed Tool: With 5 different levels of RPM, which can be adjusted among 5000 to 15000 RPM.
  5. Easy-to-use: You can grip it like a pen for ultimate control and precision as well as for comfort. Ergonomic streamlined design with over-load power-off protection for safe and reliable operation.

  • Application：

Fit for grinding pet nails and detailed works like sanding, polishing, carving, cutting.

  • Product Contents：

3.7v Cordless Rotary Tool and 55 Accessories(include USB)


Cordless Rotary Tool with 55 pcs Accessories

What you will get:

  • Cordless Rotary Tool x1
  • Sanding Bands x28
  • Grinding Bits x5+ Diamond Bits x5
  • Collets x6 + Mandrels x2
  • Polishing Wheels x2 + Twist Drill Bit x4 + Cutting Disc x2
  • Accessories Case x2
  • USB Cable x1
Warning

  1. Not for Heavy-duty Projects
  2. Do not press the lock button until the tool fully stops, or it may cause damage or even injury.
  3. Please refer to the instruction manual for a detailed operation guide.

Very useful for arts and crafts projects and small home repairs and are excellent for working in small or hard-to-reach spaces

Specifications

  • 1. Rating: 3.7V
  • 2. 5-Speed: 5000/7000/9000/12000/15000 RPM (no load)
  • 3. Color: Orange
  • 4. Collet Size: 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.4/3.0/3.2mm diameter
  • 5. Charging Port: Micro USB
  • 6. Tool Weight: 0.135kg
  • 7. Tool Size: 3.4*17.5CM

Read more





5 Rotation Speed

5 Rotation Speed controlled, you can make the speed control finely by adjusting the tool to better complete the job.

USB Charging

Rechargeable via supplied compatible USB connector at any place, more convenience for your charging. Full charging time is about 2-4 hours, and the indicator light will turn green when it is fully charged.

Easy to Use

The cordless tool with 7 different sizes compatible collet and spindle lock allows you to quickly and easily change accessories on Rotary tools. (Please make sure the bits are fixed in the rotary tool every time)

Light & Small

Powerful but small and light, like holding a pen when using.

Read more

Installation Instructions


Application




Sanding

Sanding belts and sanding discs can help your handmade crafts become smoother and smooth out the uneven surface of crafts. Such as steel rust, paint and rough wooden boards can be removed by the sanding rotary tool.

Carving

It is very easy to use for accurate DIY craft engraving on glass, wood, metal, plastic, mirrors, and other materials. You can engrave any pattern you like to create a unique gift for your family and friends.

Drilling

This Cordless Rotary Tool can be used for diamond drilling. Different sizes of drill bits and special cutting heads allow you to work easily on wood.

Read more




Polishing

Mini Rotary tools can help you remove rust from some metal surfaces. polishing Wheel and Abrasive Stone are suitable for polishing various materials. Reduce the surface roughness of the product to make its surface bright and flat.

Grinding

You can easily remove rust and polish the metal surface of the object to make the handwork more perfect.

Cutting

Suitable for cutting only light and small projects. Easy to cut plastics, wood, housings, and aluminum brass, etc.

Read more

item.title: ASUS 14" Laptop, Intel Celeron N4020 Processor, 4GB DDR4 RAM, 64GB eMMC, NumberPad, Windows 11 Home, Star Black, with MTC PC Accessories
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Intel Celeron N4020 Processor】Featuring true machine intelligence and a newly designed efficient architecture, the groundbreaking processor learns and adapts to your needs so you can achieve more.The Intel Celeron processor allows you run programs smoothly on the 14-inch HD display.【Memory & Storage】4GB system memory for basic multitasking, Adequate high-bandwidth RAM ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $159.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:52 UTC – Details)



【Intel Celeron N4020 Processor】Featuring true machine intelligence and a newly designed efficient architecture, the groundbreaking processor learns and adapts to your needs so you can achieve more.The Intel Celeron processor allows you run programs smoothly on the 14-inch HD display.
【Memory & Storage】4GB system memory for basic multitasking, Adequate high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs at the same time. This ASUS notebook PC has 64GB eMMC that shortens load times and offers ample storage.
【Long-lasting Battery Life】12hr Battery Life, Its day-long battery life gives you the flexibility to work or play anywhere.
【Windows 11 Operating System】Windows 11 has all the power and security of Windows 10 with a redesigned and refreshed look. It also comes with new tools, sounds, and apps. Every detail has been considered. All of it comes together to bring you a refreshing experience on your PC.

Price: $159.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:52 UTC – Details)
